Class Title

java.lang.Object
Title
public class Title extends Object
A Title that has the ability to be requested by a Customer. A Title consists of a title, price, notes, a flagged property, and unique ID that is generated by the database.

      flagged - Whether the title is flagged as a new release

      issueFlagged - The specific issue number that this title is flagged for
